name: Christie Digital Systems Canada
overview: Christie Digital Systems Canada, Inc. provides display technologies and solutions for cinema, audience venues, control rooms, business presentations, training facilities, three-dimensional and virtual reality, simulation, education, media, and government environments. Its technologies include DLP Cinema projectors, LCD and DLP projectors, networking solutions, film projectors, rear screen projection modules, DLP projection cubes, and wall display controllers. The company also offers ChristieNET, an Internet protocol addressable networking solution for projector control and asset management; Control Room TotalVIEW solutions, which are used in various applications in different industries where private or public large screen data, graphics, and multi-media display is utilized. Its display technologies are also used in telecommunication network operation centers, power and water management and distribution control centers, surveillance and video monitoring applications, broadcast production and control centers, conference centers, boardrooms, and retail signage environments. It serves oil and gas companies, manufacturing organizations, education and medical institutions, and entertainment market. The company is based in Kitchener, Canada. Christie Digital Systems Canada, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Christie Digital Systems USA, Inc.

funding_round.source_description: Baanto Closes Series A Financing Round
